text.content: AD 5: ROI Simple
Headline:
$2,000 Per Signed MVA Case
PI ATTORNEYS: What if you knew exactly what each case costs?

$2,000 per signed MVA case. That's the average. No surprises. No intake burnout. No wondering which leads will convert.

How it works:
1. We fund the Meta ads targeting MVA victims in your state
2. Our PI-trained intake team qualifies and closes retainers
3. You receive signed cases ready to litigate

You don't pay for leads. You don't pay for clicks. You don't pay for intake.

You pay for signed retainers.

~$2,000 average. No monthly retainer required.

Predictable cost. Predictable cases. Predictable growth.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "$2,000 PER SIGNED MVA CASE" with $2,000 in large #3399FF glowing text. CENTER: Clean three-step process. STEP 1: "We Fund Ads" with Meta icon. STEP 2: "We Qualify & Close" with intake team icon. STEP 3: "You Receive Signed Cases" with gavel icon in #3399FF glow. RIGHT: Calculator showing "Cost per lead: $XX" crossed out, "Cost per SIGNED CASE: $2,000" in #3399FF with checkmark. BOTTOM: "Predictable cost. Predictable cases. Predictable growth." DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
AD 6: Top Firms Quiet
Headline:
Why Top Firms Never Share Their Lead Sources
PI ATTORNEYS: Ever notice the best firms never talk about where their cases come from?

It's not because they don't know. It's because the moment a source becomes public knowledge, it becomes crowded.

Every "best lead vendor" thread on Reddit is a list of sources that stopped working the moment they got popular.

The best acquisition systems aren't found in forums. They're built quietly, operated exclusively, and never shared.

That's what we do:

One campaign per market. One firm. No marketplace. No reselling. The demand we generate is yours‚Äîand only yours.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

The best systems aren't crowdsourced.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "WHY TOP FIRMS NEVER SHARE THEIR SOURCES" with lock icon. CENTER: Social media mockup "Best PI Lead Vendors?" with generic replies. Large "DECOY" stamp in muted blue. Arrow: "Where average firms shop". BELOW: Dark box with #3399FF border "What top firms actually use: Private acquisition systems. One firm per market." Badge: "LIMITED PER MARKET". BOTTOM: "The best systems aren't crowdsourced." DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
AD 7: Rage Bait
Headline:
Your Lead Vendor Hopes You Never Read This
Your lead vendor is praying you never do the math.

They sold you 100 "exclusive" leads at $200 each. That's $20,000.

You signed 5 cases.

$4,000 per signed case. For leads that three other attorneys also received.

Meanwhile, they collected $80,000 from four firms for the same 100 people.

You're not the customer. You're the product.

They don't want you to close cases. They want you to keep buying leads.

We're different. We don't sell leads. We deliver signed retainers.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case. You pay for results, not hope.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Stop being the product. Start being the firm that wins.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "YOUR LEAD VENDOR HOPES YOU NEVER READ THIS" in aggressive white font. CENTER: Calculator showing vendor math: "100 leads x $200 = $20,000" ‚Üí "5 cases signed" ‚Üí "$4,000 per case" in red. Contrast box: "THEIR TAKE: $80,000 from 4 firms for same leads". Arrow pointing to "YOU'RE THE PRODUCT" stamp. BOTTOM: "Stop being the product. Start being the firm that wins." with "~$2K per signed case" in #3399FF. Expos√© aesthetic. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
AD 8: FOMO
Headline:
Your Competitors Already Know About This
Right now, a firm in your market is signing cases for $2,000 each.

While you're sorting through junk leads and blaming intake.

While you're paying $4,000+ per case and calling it "normal."

While you're wondering why your cost per acquisition keeps climbing.

They're not smarter than you. They just found a better system first.

And every week you wait, they're signing more cases in YOUR market.

We only work with one firm per market. When it's taken, it's taken.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Your market is either yours or someone else's. Choose.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "YOUR COMPETITORS ALREADY KNOW ABOUT THIS" in bold white. CENTER: Map with markets marked. Some highlighted in green "TAKEN", others in blue "AVAILABLE". Timer/clock element showing urgency. Text: "One firm per market. When it's taken, it's taken." BOTTOM: "Your market is either yours or someone else's. Choose." with "~$2K per signed case" in #3399FF. FOMO/urgency aesthetic. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
